name: Music_15.wav
caption: This is an R&B/soul music piece. There is a male vocalist singing melodically and in a sensual manner over multiple tracks. The melody of the beat is provided by a string sample. There is a strong bass sound in the piece. The rhythm is provided by a groovy electronic drum beat. There is an urban feel to this piece. It could be used in the soundtrack of a TV series where two characters are sharing intimate moments.
